body.p: As Civil law is about to be resumed in this country. I write to request of you the favor of procurring for me the appointment by Governor as Notary Public for this (Fulton) County. It does not conflict with my practice, and at present I know of no Notary in the County any professional business you may want attended to in these parts Dan. I hope you will not forget me -- My family are well -- What are you doing and how are you getting along in these "piping times of peace"
Let me hear from you immediately -- My regards to all relations & friends

Your Relation Truly
Charles T. Buck
